q.about: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators.

geocode.about: Returns tweets by users located within a given radius of the given latitude/longitude.

lang.about: Restricts tweets to the given language.

count.about: The number of tweets to return per page, up to a maximum of 100.

until.about: Returns tweets created before the given date. the search index has a 7-day limit.
